evoter.share.dao

Interface QuestionDAO


  • public interface QuestionDAO
    This is an interface that maps properties in this class to fields of QUESTION table in database
    It is responsible for insert, update, delete and search Question object in database
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        long insert(Question question)
        Add new Question to the database and return the generated key of new record
        Parameters:
        question - inserted Question
        Returns:
        the generated key of new record

      • findAll

        java.util.List<Question> findAll()
        Select all Question in the database
        Returns:
        List of Question if question list can be found
        Otherwise, returning an empty list

      • findByProperty

        java.util.List<Question> findByProperty(java.lang.String[] propertyNames,
                                      java.lang.Object[] propertyValues)
        Search Question object in the database by input properties and their values
        The length of property name array should have the same length with array of property value
        Parameters:
        propertyName - array of property name
        propertyValue - array of property value
        Returns:
        List of Question if answer list can be found
        Otherwise, return an empty list

      • findById

        java.util.List<Question> findById(long id)
        Select Question from the given id
        Parameters:
        id - given answer id
        Returns:
        List of Question if there is an records found
        Otherwise, return an empty list

      • findByUserId

        java.util.List<Question> findByUserId(long userId)
        Select Question from the given user id
        Parameters:
        user - id user id who creates question
        Returns:
        List of Question if there is an records found
        Otherwise, return an empty list
